encyclopedia.content: 英文释义 send的过去式和过去分词魔兽术语 sent是魔兽Dota常用语之一。 Sent全称：Sentinal，原意为哨兵，在DotA为近卫军团（正方）的含义。与之对应的是 Scourge（天灾军团）。

entry.def: Sent is the past tense and past participle of send.

means.word_mean: 1. caused or enabled to go or be conveyed or transmitted

auth_sentence.content: The ball is sent over by Rafael Da Silva.
